content.heading: Plug-Ins
paragraphs: Plug-ins extend browser functionality but are largely unsupported in modern browsers.
They were used for Java applets, ActiveX controls, Flash, maps, virus scans, and bank ID verification.

content.heading: <object> Element
paragraphs: The <object> element embeds objects like HTML or images in web pages:

content.heading: <embed> Element
paragraphs: The <embed> element embeds objects without a closing tag, supported since HTML5:
